<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=156) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You have a foe grabbed.

</column>

---

You thrash the grabbed foe around. It takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier plus your weapon specialization damage plus your [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=3) damage. The foe must attempt a basic Fortitude save against your class DC.

<title level="2">Thrash leads to...</title>
[Collateral Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=171)
name: Thrash
